mainText:
I would like to give my utmost condolence's to the Jobs family and may God
bless you.

America is losing one of it's pioneers. There are only a handful of people
that can be said to have left a lasting impression on the world. Steve is
one of them. He will be missed. His passion, vision, drive is what will be
missed by all. 

Thank you for everything that you have done.

God Bless!
author: Tim
